# runpod_endpoints (Data Source)

Data source to list all RunPod Serverless Endpoints.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `endpoints` (Attributes List) List of Endpoints. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--endpoints))

<a id="nestedatt--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `compute_type` (String) The compute type (GPU or CPU).
- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `execution_timeout_ms` (Number) The execution timeout in milliseconds.
- `gpu_count` (Number) The number of GPUs per worker.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the Endpoint.
- `idle_timeout` (Number) The idle timeout in seconds.
- `name` (String) The name of the Endpoint.
- `scaler_type` (String) The scaler type (QUEUE_DELAY or REQUEST_COUNT).
- `scaler_value` (Number) The scaler value.
- `template_id` (String) The template ID used by the Endpoint.
- `vcpu_count` (Number) The number of vCPUs per worker.
- `version` (Number) The endpoint version.
- `workers_max` (Number) The maximum number of workers.
- `workers_min` (Number) The minimum number of workers.
